Subjects: saints’ lives; Bartholomew, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Bartholomew in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
now nexte eftir of bartholomeIs to spek in his
                    degre…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…befor hyme þat al has senericht gud ande Ill as hyme
                    think wen
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881. 
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.180-9.
